about.heroSubtitle: Built from practice. Not from an office.

story.title: Our story
story.p1: Vysion Horeca was born from real experience. As hospitality entrepreneurs, we ran into the same problem as you: too many systems, too many costs and too little overview.
story.p2: We paid every month for separate tools: an ordering platform, accounting, payments and analytics ‚Äî all separate, nothing that really worked together. The costs added up. So did the hassle.
story.p3: So we decided to do it differently. We built one smart platform, with the ordering platform at its heart, and everything you need alongside it simply included. No unnecessary features. No separate subscriptions. Just an honest system that works for hospitality entrepreneurs.

1.question: My POS won't start
1.answer:
1. Check if the device is connected to power
  2. Hold the power button for 10 seconds to restart
  3. Check if all cables are properly connected
  4. Wait 2 minutes and try again
  5. If the problem persists, contact support

2.question: I can't log into my POS
2.answer:
1. Check if you're using the correct PIN
  2. Ask your administrator to reset your PIN
  3. Check if your account is not blocked (after 5 failed attempts)
  4. Contact support if you don't have access to an admin account

3.question: The payment terminal doesn't work
3.answer:
1. Check if the terminal is turned on (green light is on)
  2. Check the USB or Bluetooth connection
  3. Restart the terminal by turning it off and on
  4. Go to Settings ‚Üí Payment Terminal ‚Üí Reconnect
  5. Check if your internet connection is working

4.question: Receipt printer doesn't print
4.answer:
1. Check if there is paper in the printer
  2. Open and close the printer cover (this resets the printer)
  3. Check the USB/network connection
  4. Go to Settings ‚Üí Printers ‚Üí Test print
  5. If the test page doesn't print, restart the printer

5.question: My POS is slow
5.answer:
1. Close apps you're not using
  2. Check your internet connection (4G/WiFi)
  3. Restart the POS application
  4. Check if updates are available
  5. Contact support if the problem persists

6.question: Online orders aren't coming in
6.answer:
1. Check if your internet connection is working
  2. Check if the online ordering module is enabled
  3. Go to Settings ‚Üí Online Ordering ‚Üí Sync
  4. Check if your location is "open" in the system
  5. Check your opening hours in settings

7.question: I want to add or edit a product
7.answer:
1. Go to the menu top left ‚Üí Products
  2. Click "New product" or select an existing product
  3. Fill in the name, price and category
  4. Click "Save"
  5. The product is now available on your POS

8.question: How do I make a Z-report / day closing?
8.answer:
1. Go to the menu top left ‚Üí Reports
  2. Select "Z-Report" or "Day Closing"
  3. Check the details
  4. Click "Close and print"
  5. The report is printed and the day is closed

9.question: I forgot my password
9.answer:
1. Go to the login page
  2. Click "Forgot password"
  3. Enter your email address
  4. You will receive a link to reset your password
  5. Or contact support: +32 492 12 93 83

10.question: The app keeps crashing
10.answer:
1. Close the app completely
  2. Restart your device
  3. Check if you have the latest version of the app
  4. Remove and reinstall the app (your data is preserved)
  5. Contact support if the problem persists
